sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import {Container, Button} from '../../globalStyles'
import { 
    AboutSec, 
    Header, 
    BodyColumn, 
    Column1, 
    Column2 } from "./AboutSection.elements";

const AboutSection = ({
    lightBg,
}) => {
    return (
        <>
            <AboutSec>
                <Container>
                    <Header>Here is why we exist</Header>
                    <BodyColumn>
                        <Column1>
                        Raising Transparency in the hiring process
                        Fundraising is hard enough as is, let alone when you have no clue who you're dealing with. 
                        We believe raising transparency in the startup fundraising ecosystem will create a net 
                        positive for everyone involved.
                        </Column1>
                        <Column2>
                        Supporting Founders
Building a business is f*cking hard work! We're passionate about supporting founders on their journey in any way that we can, and are building out a roadmap of products that reflects that.</Column2>
                    </BodyColumn>

                    <Link to="/">
                    <Button >
                        Geza
                    </Button>
                    </Link>
                </Container>
            </AboutSec>
        </>
    )
}

export default AboutSection;
